description:
If fs is None, this function produce AttributeError
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/virt/disk.py#L278

API as follows has same problem
_inject_net_into_fs
_inject_metadata_into_fs
title: _inject_key_into_fs should check fs is None or not

comments.content:
If fs is None, this function produce AttributeError
https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/stable/diablo/nova/virt/disk.py#L278

API as follows has same problem
_inject_net_into_fs
_inject_metadata_into_fs

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
I think we need an example of when this is actually a problem.

Since this bug is so old, I'm just going to close it (Invalid) instead of marking Incomplete.  Feel free to reopen this with details of how the problem can occur.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
